The breakfast room is way too small for this hotel sometimes you had to wait more than 15minutes to get a table for breakfast
When asking for reservations at restaurants the front desk was not very helpful it really depends on the person you talk too
I got a cous cous salad one lunchtime and I have to say I can make a much nicer one at home myself
There is an common open indoor space for lunch diner bar and another room accessible only for breakfast
Upon departure I asked for a bottle of water and she said I had to go to the bar and pay for it
The only recommendation would be that you could serve snacks
The breakfast was really crowded and not much healthy choices
The breakfast coffee is to be avoided
yesterday and today pool bar service very very slow breakfast this morning was a bit of a battle
1: The breakfast includes meats cheeses smoked salmon porridge fresh fruit nuts yogourt breads and tempting pastries

excellent view on the ocean from the restaurant breakfast and dinner room pool and garden clean design interior yet cozy atmosphere they let you feel absolutely welcome eg the suggestion to carry your suitcases to your rom very helpful staf a small sand beach in just a few steps down the garden garden exactly as the pictures on the website restaurant with tasty refined yet average priced dishesnothing
The pool the staff and the amazing breakfast

Every single one of them was friendly and helpful and all bent over backwards to help even when we had n’t booked for dinner at the excellent restaurant the manager made sure he could fit us in and we had a great meal with great wine with a amazing view over the harbour
Lovely BIG breakfast choice can not fault anything about this hotel

the hotel is wonderful the staff are amazing whilst there last time my husband was taken ill and they could not have been any more helpful we ended up having to saty an extra night as he was taken to hospital and they did not charge us for the extra night plus the manager took care for me and even had breakfast with me
Very complete rich and varied breakfast
The restaurant food was fantastic service was amazing
Restaurant on property was very good
